document_data.name: ''Warblade''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Warblade''''' was an [[Item enchantment|enchanted]] [[greatsword]] that originated from the [[barbarian]] tribes of [[the North]].
document_data.Description: The sword was crafted during a raging battle. After it was forged, the blade was dipped in the blood of courageous fallen warriors.
document_data.Powers: The ''Warblade'' possessed a ''+4 enchantment'' that was said to have bestowed by barbarian gods themselves.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, the sword was in the possession of [[Ribald Barterman]], a merchant in [[Athkatla]].
